trans-unit.source: Enables a user to select a valid disk drive at run time.
trans-unit.target: Lar brukeren å velge en gyldig stasjon på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: Use this control to display a list of all the valid drives in a user's system.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne kontrollen skal vises en liste over alle gyldig stasjoner i systemet.

trans-unit.source: You can create dialog boxes that enable the user to open a file from a list of files on a disk in any available drive.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette dialogbokser som tillater brukeren å åpne en fil fra en liste over filer på en disk i alle tilgjengelige stasjon.

trans-unit.source: If you also display the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> controls, you can write code to synchronize them with the `DriveListBox` control and with each other.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du også vise den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>og <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox>kontroller, kan du skrive kode som synkroniseres med den `DriveListBox` kontrollen og med hverandre.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FileListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A `DriveListBox` control enables a user to select a valid disk drive at run time.
trans-unit.target: En `DriveListBox` kontroll gir brukeren å velge en gyldig stasjon på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir datakilden for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skal ikke angis for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollere; sendes bare fordi <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollen arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interfaces, such as a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> or a <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.IList>eller <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> grensesnitt som en <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> eller <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property to display for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir til å vise dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skal ikke angis for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollere; sendes bare fordi <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollen arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> that represents the name of an object property and is contained in the collection specified by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> som representerer navnet på en egenskap, og den finnes i samlingen angitt av den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.DataSource*>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref> control and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref> kontrollere og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metode med disposing-parameteren som er angitt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med parameteren disposing satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: Når parameteren disposing er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som refererer til denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnemodus for en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control; it is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen skal ikke angis for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollere; sendes bare fordi <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollen arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode*> values that represent the mode for drawing the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode*>verdier som representerer modus for å tegne elementene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DrawMode*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected drive at run time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den valgte stasjonen ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: The valid drives for the `Drive` property include all drives present in or connected to the system when the control is created or refreshed at run time.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig stasjoner for den `Drive` egenskapen inkluderer alle stasjoner finnes i eller koblet til systemet når kontrollen opprettes eller oppdateres på kjøretidspunktet.

trans-unit.source: The default setting of the `Drive` property is the current drive.
trans-unit.target: Standardinnstillingen for den `Drive` egenskapen er gjeldende stasjon.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> expression that specifies the selected drive.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> uttrykk som angir den valgte stasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the style of a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref> combo box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref> kombinasjonsboksen.

trans-unit.source: The `DropDownStyle` property controls the interface that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Den `DropDownStyle` egenskapen kontrollerer grensesnittet som vises for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: You can enter a value that provides a simple drop-down list box, where the list always appears, a drop-down list box, where the text portion is not editable and you must select an arrow to view the drop-down, or the default drop-down list box, where the text portion is editable and the user must press the arrow key to view the list.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en verdi som gir en enkel rullegardinlisten, der listen alltid vises en rullegardinliste, der refererer ikke redigerbare og du må velge en pil til å vise rullegardinlisten, eller standard rullegardinlisten boksen der refererer redigeres og brukeren må trykke på for å vise en liste over.

trans-unit.source: To always display a list that the user cannot edit, use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil alltid vise en liste som brukeren ikke kan redigere, kan du bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>, you can select only valid values from the list.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den `DropDownStyle` egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>, du kan velge bare gyldige verdier fra listen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>

trans-unit.source: If you set the `DropDownStyle` property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>, you can type any value in the editable area of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den `DropDownStyle` egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>, kan du angi en verdi i det redigerbare området for <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter høyden på et element i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not required for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control; the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> does not support items of variable height.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kreves ikke for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollere; den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>støtter ikke elementer med variabel høyde.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: It is provided only because the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox> control inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes bare fordi <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>kontrollen arver fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Høyden på et element i kontrollen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the items that are contained in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementene som finnes i en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve a list of drives that are currently displayed in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente en liste over stasjoner som vises i en <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> that represents the items in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>som representerer elementene i den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DirListBox"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the item for a specified index in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet for en angitt indeks i en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve the name of a drive in a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å hente navnet på en stasjon i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: The number of a specific item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Antall et spesifikt element i listen.

trans-unit.source: A that contains the name of the drive at the specified Index.
trans-unit.target: En som inneholder navnet på stasjonen i den angitte Index .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum length of text displayed in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir den maksimale lengden på teksten som vises i en <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to limit the length of text that a user can enter into the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å begrense lengden på teksten som kan registreres i <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller disse funksjonene og objekter duplisert funksjonaliteten som du finner andre navneområder i den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that specifies the maximum length for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.Drive*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> som angir den maksimale lengden for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.Drive*>egenskapen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DriveListBox.Drive*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The `OnBackColorChanged` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnBackColorChanged` metoden kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Funksjoner og objekter i den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>navneområde er angitt for bruk av verktøyene for oppgradering fra Visual Basic 6.0 til [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.target: De er nødvendige bare når Visual Basic 6.0 kode modellen er ulikt betydelig den [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementeringen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The `OnDrawItem` method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnDrawItem` metoden kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Forces the control to invalidate its client area and immediately redraw itself.
trans-unit.target: Tvinger kontrollen for å gjøre det klientområdet og tegne umiddelbart seg selv.
